item.title: Build homepage on Github pages with Hugo Framework
item.description: Instruction I built a homepage hosted in the Github pages with Hugo. Install Hugo Please follow this link to install Hugo. My platform is Ubuntu and I use the following command line installing Hugo sudo snap install hugo Create the static website Use the hugo command to create your static website. hugo new site homepage --format yaml Run the below command to have a test locally. hugo server Create a homepage in Github The benifits of deploying the static website are:
